name: 3E Company
overview: 3E Company, Inc. provides environmental health and safety (EHS) compliance and information management services. The company offers data products and information services, and online tools that enable compliance with EHS requirements related to the manufacturing, distribution, transportation, usage, and disposal of chemicals and hazardous products. Its products and services include regulatory and chemical content, EHS data access and decision support, MSDS authoring, MSDS distribution, MSDS management, transportation, emergency response, training, regulatory reporting, REACH solutions, and waste services. The company also provides professional services, such as outsourced REACH registration, third party representative, only representative, European product registration, dangerous goods safety adviser, chemical control law, chemical and regulatory data management, and compliance analysis services. The company serves manufacturing, chemicals, consumer products, food ingredients and food contact, flavor and fragrances, pesticides, petrochemicals, pharmaceuticals and life sciences, high tech, aerospace and defense, chemical distributors, transportation, healthcare, utilities, and retail industries. 3E Company, Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Carlsbad, California with additional operations in Massillon, Ohio; Bethesda, Maryland; Kingsport, Tennessee; Montreal, Canada; and Copenhagen, Denmark.
